name.ja: ピース<ruby>＆<rt>アンド</rt></ruby>ロックンロール

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster while you have "Prima Guitarna the Shining Superstar" or "Esperade the Smashing Superstar" face-up on your field.

effect.en: Destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field. Then, if your LP are 2000 or lower, this turn, you take no battle damage, also you take no damage from your opponent's card effects.
